name: HRapp
description:
HRapp built a platform to manage the 21st-century workforce
 As all the major fields, Human Resource Management has taken many leaps over the years. We hated the idea of thrusting HRs with out-moded software as “solutions” to manage their day-to-day tasks. We want to disrupt the HR Tech Space for better and equip HRs and employees with an end-to-end platform that is as interactive as social media, yet powerful enough to handle all HR tasks effortlessly.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Streamline your talent management workflows with one of the most innovative platform.
ShortDescription: HRAPP is a Cloud-Based HRMS and Payroll solution with cutting edge web technologies.

Highlights.name: No, Spreadsheets can’t do them all
Highlights.description: Managing your workforce using Spreadsheets will only pull you down, hamper your productivity and give you only a unidirectional view on your workforce, especially if your organization has more than 10 members

Highlights.name: Ultimate Workforce Efficiency Hacker
Highlights.description: With HRAPP, Organisations can effectively track the productivity of employee's business activities and capture screenshots optionally. Employee Monitoring software comes with a desktop client for all major platforms to support the endpoint monitoring capability and reporting.

Highlights.name: Have all the data at your fingertips?
Highlights.description: The more data-driven the world becomes, the more it expects you to become data-informed. Imagine pulling out all the stats you need about your workforce from anywhere.

enhanced_description: HRapp is a cloud-based HRMS and Payroll solution designed to manage the 21st-century workforce, equipping HR professionals and employees with an end-to-end platform. It aims to disrupt the HR Tech Space by offering an interactive experience, similar to social media, while being powerful enough to handle all HR tasks effortlessly using cutting-edge web technologies. The platform provides unique and custom solutions, supporting various business-related aspects from talent acquisition to workforce management and employee productivity tracking.
key_use_cases: Tracking employee productivity and business activities (with optional screenshot capture)
Providing data-driven insights and workforce analytics
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Offers unique and custom solutions for HR problems
Includes employee monitoring with desktop clients for major platforms (productivity tracking, optional screenshots)
Eliminates the need for traditional spreadsheet-based HR management
Enables data-driven decision-making with readily available workforce data
technology_stack: Desktop client for all major platforms (for employee monitoring)
roi_benefits: Reduces reliance on manual HR processes (e.g., spreadsheets)
